articles.description: The top diplomat delivers the strongest US remarks yet in Israel on protecting Palestinian civilians.

articles.description: Palestinians tell the BBC they were beaten and had dogs set on them while in Israeli detention.

articles.description: Magnum says he will be remembered for seeking out life's "most absurd and charming moments".
articles.title: Elliott Erwitt: Legendary photographer dies aged 95

articles.title: US Senator Rand Paul performs Heimlich on Senator Joni Ernst

articles.description: The London premiere of Beyoncé's tour film included an special guest and a demand for dancing.

articles.title: What US agents knew before a Canadian Sikh activist was killed

articles.description: A damning ethics report on the Republican has all but assured he will be removed from the US House.

articles.description: It would cost about $30bn (£24bn) and take a decade, the Environmental Protection Agency says.
articles.title: Can US pull off a $30bn plan to dump lead water pipes?
